author: paul_w

comments.content:
Manchester: [VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052442/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Vag+rounded)  
WATER TAXI: [Kada](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052442/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Graphic+Fonts/Kada) by Joel Nordstroem for Lineto

"Manchester" looks like **[VAG Rounded (Bold or Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052442/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=VAG%20Rounded%20Std%20-%20Black%20Bold&fid=11bd08cf2d56cd43cd54bbfd12a20756&fsize=60&text=Manchester&wrap=2)**

"WATER TAXI" was probably based on **[Frankfurter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052442/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Frankfurter%20LET%20-%20Plain&fid=7560ef426e58b8dd757d513a47a6353d&fsize=60&text=WATER%20TAXI&fit=1)** and then manually filled and "stencilized".

\*Edit\* I see that Ryuk found a proper match for "WATER TAXI" :)
You wanna let the other guys have a chance to answer for a change Ryuk?
